pullRequest.title: Avoid null values when resolving alternative priority
pullRequest.bodyText:
Avoid comparing null values when comparing alternative priorities
Resolves #8895

nodes.bodyText: At this point priority1 and priority2 may not be null. So I'd either remove the checks or throw an ISE or something like that.
